title: The Taste of Her
description: World War II is over and Iris Cole is betrothed to a handsome Captainâ€”but the future is hard to enjoy when she still secretly mourns her lost lover, Lillian. At a military base in Germany she meets the mysterious Beth and becomes something other than human, swept up in Beth's grim cause, and determined to learn what Beth has to do with Lillian.
author: Jay  Robin
